install.title: 1. Install
install.desc: Download the installer for your OS from our official website. Run the installer and follow the prompts.

launch.title: 2. Launch
launch.desc: Open 'FileTransferLAN' after installation. The software will automatically scan for other devices on the same LAN.

send.title: 3. Send Files
send.desc: Select the target device, click 'Send File'. Choose files and wait for the recipient to accept.

receive.title: 4. Receive Files
receive.desc: When a device sends you a file, a prompt will appear. Click 'Receive' to start downloading.

q1.question: Why can't I find other devices?
q1.answer: Ensure all devices are on the same WiFi network and firewall is not blocking the software.

q2.question: Why is the transfer speed slow?
q2.answer: Speed depends on router performance and signal quality. Try moving closer to the router or use 5GHz band.

q3.question: Is there a file size limit?
q3.answer: Theoretically no limit, as long as you have enough disk space.

q4.question: Is internet required?
q4.answer: No internet required, only a local area network (LAN) is needed.
